title: UNIQUEBELLA Men's Thermal Underwear Sets Top & Long Johns Fleece Sweat Quick Drying Thermo Base Layer
description: HEAT PRESERVATION & SUPER WARM: Designed with high quality fleece lining, the thermal underwear mens is windproof, it can keep you warm while running, cycling, hiking, jogging or walking the dog in the winter morning. Stay active and cozy this winter with our expertly engineered thermal wear!

BREATHABILITY & QUICK DRY: Breathable and moisture wicking fabric is perfect to keep sweat away and dry fast, the mens thermal underwear perfectly repels odors and unpleasant smells left behind from sweat and dirt; With this thermal underwear men, you can happily enjoy outdoor tactical training or sports

STRETCHABLE & ABRASION RESISTANT: Made of 90% polyester and 10% spandex, this army thermal underwear offers maximum freedom and support of your body, protecting your muscle trauma during training and keeping you stay comfortable. Flatlock stitching creates a flat seam to the garment to ensure maximum comfort and prevents chafing

OUT WEAR SHIRT LEGGINGS: This thermal underwear set definitely can be wore as an outdoor compression sports shirt, the tight shirt leggings set would be a great gift to your boyfriend or families for all seasons

SUNDRY OCCASIONS: This thermal underwear men for cold weather is idea gear for all kinds of activities, such as training, rash guard, running, squat, weight training, cycling, yoga, soccer, skiing, snowboarding, indoor gym exercise, fitness body training
